info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 12 at 5:07PM PDT until September 12 at 8:30PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... San Bernardino County in southern California... South Central Clark County in southern Nevada... * Until 830 PM PDT. * At 507 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain along Highway 95 in Clark County. This water will flow down Piute Wash, causing flash flooding at Highway 95 near Mile Marker 70 in San Bernardino County. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Laughlin, Searchlight and Cal-Nev-Ari. This includes the following highways... Highway 95 in Clark County between mile marker 0 and mile marker 19. Highway 95 in San Bernardino County between mile markers 70 and 80. State Route 163 in Clark County between mile markers 0 and 2. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
